abstract: Ryan Heshka, a Canadian illustrator, created what he viewed as a campy cover for the 2012 product catalog issued by Cinelli, the venerable Italian bicycle and bicycle parts maker.
snippet: Ryan Heshka, a Canadian illustrator, created what he viewed as a campy cover for the 2012 product catalog issued by Cinelli, the venerable Italian bicycle and bicycle parts maker.

headline.main: For a Bicycle Catalog Artist, It's Harmony on the Road, Mayhem on the Canvas
